body.name: JBL Clip 3, Blue - Waterproof, Durable & Portable Bluetooth Speaker - Up to 10 Hours of Play - Includes Noise-Cancelling Speakerphone & Wireless Streaming
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 54 mins
features: SOUND TO GO - Never leave awesome sound at home again. This ultra-portable, waterproof Bluetooth speaker is small in size but with surprisingly big sound. Clip it on with the built-in carabiner, press play, and make the moment pop.

UP TO 10 HOURS OF PLAYTIME - The JBL Clip 3 features a built-in rechargeable Li-ion battery with up to 10 hours of battery life, plus a metal carabiner so you can easily hook it to your clothes, backpack, or belt loop.

NOISE CANCELLING & WIRELESS STREAMING - Wirelessly stream high-quality sound from your smartphone or tablet. Plus, take crystal-clear calls from your speaker with the touch of a button, thanks to the noise and echo-cancelling speakerphone.

WATERPROOF & DURABLE - No more worrying about rain or spills: JBL Clip 3 is completely waterproof—you can even immerse it in water. Plus, the improved, durable fabric material and rugged rubber housing protects it on all of your outdoor adventures.

THE SOUND PROMISE - JBL has brought music to life in a way people can feel for over 70 years. From Woodstock to the Motion Picture Academy, our speakers unleash the power of music so you can live life to the fullest, wherever and whenever.
body.description: Like no other, The JBL clip 3 is a unique ultra-portable, ultra-rugged and waterproof Bluetooth speaker that is small in size but with surprisingly big sound. The upgraded durable and fully integrated carabiner clips to your clothes, belt loop or backpack, making the clip 3 Your outdoor companion on every adventure. The clip 3 is IPX7 waterproof and offers 10 hours of playtime, powered by a 1000mAh rechargeable li-ion battery, allowing you to bring your music with you. A built-in noise and echo-cancelling speakerphone gives you crystal clear calls with the press of a button.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pink Powerhouse: Waterproof, Portable, and Oh-So-Stylish! 🌸🔊👌
reviews.reviewText: TLDR: Found my wife's dream speaker in pink, waterproof wonder, clip-on convenience! 🎉🎶💦I'm totally smitten with this speaker! I'm part of the Walmart crew, where we stock these babies in black, camo, and silver for 59 bucks. But guess what? I snagged it here for a sweet $20 less and in the dreamiest shade of pink!Quality-wise, this speaker is a rockstar. The first thing I did? Tossed it into the pool to test its waterproof bragging rights. And yes, it floats like a champ, unscathed and ready to party. It’s perfect for chill water activities - think leisurely kayaking or canoeing, but maybe not for the adrenaline-pumping white-water rafting since it’s adorably palm-sized.The sound, oh the sound! It’s that classic JBL clarity and crispness, minus any annoying Bluetooth hiccups. Don’t expect to shake the walls with its volume, though. It’s loud enough for normal activities, but if you’re planning to outdo your neighbors in a sound battle, this isn't your weapon of choice.Now, the clip is a game-changer. It’s not your average flimsy clip. This thing latches onto anything - doorknobs, backpacks, belt loops - without a hitch. It’s like, clip it and forget it’s even there. That's how good it is.Battery life? They say 10 hours, but it feels like forever. I got a solid 8-9 hours straight out of the box, no charging needed.Okay, tiny gripe time. It has these little rubber nubs at the bottom, probably for grip. They're kind of annoying against the skin, but hey, 90% of the time, it’s clipped onto something, so no biggie.To sum it up:Sound quality: 9/10 - Pure clarity.Volume: 7/10 - Just right for the average Joe.Portability: 10/10 - Clip and go!Waterproofness: 10/10 - Pool party approved.Battery life: 10/10 - Lasts almost an eternity.Color: 10/10 - The pink is even prettier in real life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your Perfect On-the-Go Companion
reviews.reviewText: Pros:Stylish and portable design with a sturdy carabinerExcellent waterproof performanceImpressive battery life for long-lasting playtimeIdeal for quieter settingsDurable and built to withstand outdoor adventuresCons:Not super loud for noisy environmentsMicrophone quality not the bestThe JBL Clip 3 in Blue is an exceptional waterproof, durable, and portable Bluetooth speaker that has truly won me over! It's become my go-to companion for outdoor adventures and impromptu hangouts with friends. While there are a couple of minor considerations, everything else about this speaker is simply fantastic.The first thing that caught my attention was its stunning blue color, making it a stylish addition to my outdoor gear. Its compact size and sturdy build make it incredibly portable, and the integrated carabiner allows me to clip it to my backpack with ease. This convenience is unbeatable, especially during hikes and beach outings.As for its waterproof feature, I've tested it by the poolside, and it passed with flying colors! I don't have to worry about accidental splashes or light rain; the JBL Clip 3 handles it like a pro.The battery life is another highlight, offering up to 10 hours of continuous playtime. I can enjoy my favorite tunes all day long without needing frequent charging breaks.The noise-canceling speakerphone is a great addition, ensuring crystal-clear calls, even in noisy environments. My friends were amazed at the quality of our phone calls during our outdoor gatherings.Now, while the sound quality is impressive for its size, I did notice that the speaker isn't super loud. In quieter surroundings, it's perfect, but in noisy outdoor settings, I wished for a bit more volume.Another consideration is that I haven't tested the microphone quality extensively during calls. Although the speakerphone worked well for me, I can't provide a detailed assessment of its performance in various scenarios.Despite these minor points, the JBL Clip 3 excels in almost every other aspect. Its portability, durability, and waterproof capabilities make it the perfect travel companion, and the battery life ensures hours of uninterrupted enjoyment.In conclusion, the JBL Clip 3 in Blue is a top-notch Bluetooth speaker that offers remarkable portability, durability, and sound quality for most situations. Its versatility makes it an excellent choice for anyone seeking a reliable outdoor companion. Though not the loudest and microphone quality not extensively tested, its impressive features far outweigh these minor considerations. If you're looking for a compact and powerful speaker to enhance your outdoor experiences, the JBL Clip 3 is an outstanding choice!
This is a very good product

Tuve el modelo anterior y esta tiene la misma calidad. Es muy práctica, con muy buen sonido. Solo se debe cuidar la bateria para que tenga una vida mas prolongada (No golpear la bocina, no dejar que se descargué por completo y al cargar la bateria procurar no desconectarla hasta que haya hecho la carga completa.)

reviews.reviewTitle: Amei! Só peca em um quesito!
reviews.reviewText: Eu amei! Só não dei 5 estrelas por uma pequena falta, na minha opinião... Não é possível mudar para a próxima música ou voltar através da caixa, apenas mexer no volume e pausar... Achei uma falta grande...De restante ela é maravilhosa!

Came with a charging cord, no charging block. Good sound for a small speaker. Connects via Bluetooth easily. Use it for work and pairs quickly to my Surface Pro. Good for travelling. Had a very useful clip. Right now, it’s clipped to my shower rod for shower music and makes for amazing acoustics. Got it on a flash deal. Don’t know if I’d pay full price. I have a Charge 4 and it’s a better quality and lasts longer. If you have another JBL,You can link them and have the same music playing all around your house. Super neat aspect to JBL
Entrega rápida. Excelente produto!! Atendeu minhas expectativas.
